mdq:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Horizontal coverage extent of product (eg : surface of the Mediterranean Sea)
Horizontal mesh size or equivalent value for the given scale of product (eg 50m for 1/50 000)
Average vertical sampling and description of specific vertical sampling schema (100 words max)
Percentage error of the product and description of error concept for the product (100 words max) provided by expert
Max elapsed time between last input data records update and product creation date
